description: Receipt image is blurry or out of focus
expected_behavior: Extract what's readable, flag low confidence, note image quality issues

description: Handwritten receipt with varied legibility
expected_behavior: Attempt OCR, flag as handwritten, note any unclear text

description: Receipt in non-English language
expected_behavior: Extract text, identify language, extract numbers/dates regardless of language

description: Receipt with multiple line items
expected_behavior: Extract all line items with descriptions, quantities, and amounts

description: Receipt lacks clear vendor name or details
expected_behavior: Extract available info, flag missing vendor data

description: Receipt with non-standard layout or format
expected_behavior: Parse structure, extract key fields, note format complexity

description: Receipt showing subtotal, tax, and total separately
expected_behavior: Extract and separate subtotal, tax, tip, and total amounts

description: Receipt showing tip line and calculations
expected_behavior: Extract tip amount separately from total

description: Receipt showing split payment across multiple methods
expected_behavior: Extract all payment methods and amounts

description: Receipt in foreign currency
expected_behavior: Identify currency from symbols or text, extract amounts correctly

description: Receipt with various date formats
expected_behavior: Parse date correctly regardless of format

description: Receipt with both date and time
expected_behavior: Extract both date and time accurately

description: Receipt containing alcohol line items
expected_behavior: Extract all items including alcohol, identify alcohol items

description: Restaurant receipt with food and beverage items
expected_behavior: Categorize as meal expense, extract all food items

description: Hotel or accommodation receipt
expected_behavior: Identify as lodging, extract nightly rate, dates, location

description: Flight booking or airline receipt
expected_behavior: Identify as airfare, extract flight details, class, amount

description: Car rental or transportation receipt
expected_behavior: Identify transportation expense, extract rental details

description: Parking or toll charges receipt
expected_behavior: Identify expense type, extract amount, location, time

description: Receipt for office or business supplies
expected_behavior: Categorize as supplies, extract items and amounts

description: Receipt for entertainment or client meals
expected_behavior: Identify as entertainment, extract details

description: Distinguish between invoice and actual receipt
expected_behavior: Identify document type, extract relevant data

description: Receipt with faded or light text
expected_behavior: Extract readable portions, flag quality issues

description: Receipt that is physically damaged or crumpled
expected_behavior: Extract what's visible, note damage

description: Receipt with very small text or low resolution image
expected_behavior: Attempt extraction, flag resolution issues

description: Receipt where total amount is not clearly marked
expected_behavior: Calculate from line items if possible, flag missing total

description: Receipt marked as duplicate or copy
expected_behavior: Extract data, note duplicate status

description: Receipt showing purchase date, posting date, etc.
expected_behavior: Extract all dates, identify which is transaction date

description: Receipt cluttered with promotions and ads
expected_behavior: Filter out promotional text, extract transaction data

description: Receipt showing last 4 digits of payment card
expected_behavior: Extract card last four, identify payment method

description: Receipt indicating cash payment
expected_behavior: Identify cash payment method

description: Receipt spanning multiple pages
expected_behavior: Note multi-page status, extract from visible page

description: Receipt showing return or refund transaction
expected_behavior: Identify as return/refund, extract negative amount

description: Receipt from chain store with location info
expected_behavior: Extract store name, location, store number

description: Receipt containing QR code or barcode
expected_behavior: Note QR code presence, extract text data

description: Receipt with unusually large total amount
expected_behavior: Extract amount accurately, note high value
